thread.title: Helen of Benfleet
thread.title_full: Official Car Mats reviewed by Helen of Benfleet

author: Helen of Benfleet
title: Helen of Benfleet
text: I ordered a set of the luxury car mats as a present for a friend. As they were a VW Passat they can have two fixings and unable to check exactly which fixings were correct I took a guess and ....ordered the wrong ones. The company couldn't have been more helpful both on the phone and in exchanging the mats for the correct ones and as an even more pleasant surprise they covered the cost of my returning the wrong ones with a downloadable postage label ! The mats are a perfect fit and excellent quality and very good value for money.
